message.subject: Gas Analysis
message.content:
M1.1. Chris--
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.2. Could you find out if Patina has performed a gas analysis on the zone to be completed at your new well. [Y]
[Request-Information: find out if Patina has performed a gas analysis on well zone]
Flink1.2
M1.3. If/when you receive a gas analysis, our operations guys like to review this data for all new interconnects (obviously, this information is kept confidential).
[Inform: if Chris receives a gas analysis, operations guys would like to review data]
Sflink1.3
M1.4. Thanks.
[Conventional: thanks]
M1.5. Dan
[Conventional: signature]
M1.6. P.S. As we approach an "in-service date" (which is estimated to be during the first half of December), let's get together with Mark Whitt to discuss and coordinate gathering and marketing strategies. [Y]
[Inform: as they approach "in-service date", Dan would like to have a discussion with Chris and Mark Whitt]

message.subject: Gas Analysis
message.content:
M2.1. No..they have not done a gas analysis..
[Inform: Patina has not done a gas analysis]
Blink1.2
M2.2. but will certainly pass it along when we have one.
[Inform: Chris will pass along data after analysis is performed]
Blink1.3
